raw_body: SALGADO – RAMYA LAKSHMINI nee JAYASEKERA – Dearly beloved wife of late M. Piyadasa Salgado (Retired Surveyor General),​ loving mother of Bimalka,​ Mouli & Chayanika,​ mother-in-law of Rohitha Seneviratne,​ Palitha Hendahewa & Sanjeewa Padumadasa,​ grandmother of Senali,​ Kulanaka,​ Virunaka,​ Sandith,​ Devmi & Archana,​ daughter of late Charles & late Sisira Jayasekera,​ sister of Kanthi Katepearachchi,​ passed away peacefully. Remains lie at 43/​20,​ Fieldview Gardens,​ Rajamaha Vihara Road,​ Nawinna,​ Maharagama. Cremation on Thursday 31st of August at General Cemetery Kanatte (New Crematorium) at 4.30 p.m.054518
